alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 2:32PM MDT until April 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, moderate at times. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with the higher amounts near Bondurant. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin Foothills. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Tuesday. There will likely be a lull in the steady snowfall between midnight and 6 AM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility could be reduced to under a half mile in heavier bursts of snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West
